text: Ej mardum, misole ovarda sud. Ba on gus dihed. Kasonero, ki ʙa coi Alloh ma'ʙudi xud mexoned va madad metalaʙed, agar hama cam' savand, magase (passae)-ro naxohand ofarid va agar magase cize az onho ʙiraʙojad, nametavonand onro az u ʙoz pas ʙigirand. Pas, toliʙu matluʙ hardu (darmondavu) notavonand! Pas, ʙo in qadar xoriju notavoni ci guna in ʙuthoro parastis karda mesavad
